title: Spaghetti Bolognese
methods: Preheat the oil over'a medium to high heat in a deep frying pan or wok. Add the classic vegetable base mix and cook for 3-4 minutes stirring continuously.
Add the garlic and mushrooms, cover and cook over a medium to high heat stirring frequently for 4 minutes.
Add the beef mince and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently.
Add the chopped tomatoes, worcestershire sauce, vegetable stock, tomato puree, oregano, salt and pepper. Cook for 8-10 minutes meanwhile, cook the spaghetti according to pack instructions.
